triples.name: Proximal policy optimization
triples.relevance: The paper proposes PPO-based multi-agent algorithms as a strong baseline for cooperative multi-agent reinforcement learning.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning is the fundamental machine learning paradigm underlying the entire work on multi-agent learning.

triples.name: Multi-agent learning
triples.relevance: Multi-agent reinforcement learning is the main focus area where the paper demonstrates PPO's effectiveness in cooperative settings.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: PPO is a policy gradient method, and understanding policy gradient approaches is essential to understanding PPO's design.

triples.name: Cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on cooperative multi-agent games where players share common goals, drawing from cooperative game theory principles.

triples.name: StarCraft II
triples.relevance: StarCraft II is used as a testbed environment through the StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge for evaluating PPO's performance.

triples.name: Hanabi (card game)
triples.relevance: Hanabi is a cooperative card game used as one of the popular multi-agent testbeds to evaluate PPO's performance.
